resources.string: What type of account do you want to make?
Community organizers post their events on FairChance. For example, swimming lessons for 20 kids or a yoga class with 15 spots.
Anyone interested can sign up for the event\'s waiting list during the open registration period (e.g., one week). There\'s no rush - just indicate your interest before the sign-up window closes.
When registration closes, the system randomly selects the allowed number of participants (e.g., 20 kids). Selected users are notified automatically through the app.
If a selected participant can\'t attend, they can decline their spot, and the system will draw another applicant from the waiting list ensuring all available spots are filled fairly.
Traditional event sign-ups often reward whoever can click the fastest. FairChance replaces that pressure with equal opportunity.
FairChance isn\'t just for participants - It simplifies your work too:

• Create and manage multiple events at once.
• Automatically generate and notify your participant lists.
• Handle cancellations and redraws directly in the app.
• Keep track of progress and attendance in one place.

• Browse and join community events effortlessly.
• Track your event entries and lottery results.
• Accept or decline spots easily in-app.
• Get reminders and notifications about event updates.
